title: go.tools/go/types: RFE: add RelativeString(Type, *Package) method that suppresses package qualification
body:
Please expose a function (or a Type interface method) RelativeString(T Type, P *Package)
from go/types that works like Type.String() except that the names of package-level types
are not package-qualified if their package is identical to P.  If P is nil it behaves
like String().

This allows UIs to produce less verbose for names of things where the package is obvious
from the context.
